# Schooner
## Overview
**Schooner:** Characterized by a long keel and fore-andaft-rigged gaff sails and jibs, schooners are fast, and can sail very close to the wind. They are used for fishing and as fast merchant vessels, but are rarely armed, relying on superb maneuverability to evade trouble.

**Source:** Ships of the Inner Sea (Paizo), pg. 5
